short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a feeling of depth, appeal and space

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Showcases a mesmerizing spiral galaxy, with a dominant purple hue surrounding a radiant golden light at its center. Scattered stars fill the space, evoking the vastness and infinity of the universe. The purple tones blended with the warm orange glow create a deep, captivating, and cosmic atmosphere, making it perfect for space enthusiasts and astronomy lovers.
